channel.title: Why does EA suck so bad?
channel.description:
I sent a message to them and it said (24 hours) but they still didn't send me a damn message.
Ok they replied but watch they wont reply again until like 5 days later.

item.title: Why does EA suck so bad?
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

davidude36:

I guess EA’s help section is filled with idiot people asking how to get the sims 5 or some shit.

no its just fuckin retarded

item.title: Why does EA suck so bad?
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

[quote=“runescape3dude, post:14, topic:246495”]Whoops, their bmps are so low resolution they are only like 3kb each… It would still be better if they used png.

@frank_ look at almost all the Flight simulator textures.[/quote]
so because they are low resolution they go from a few mbs to a few kb? quit while your ahead kid.

Read full topic

item.title: Why does EA suck so bad?
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“runescape3dude, post:10, topic:246495”][quote author=frank_ link=topic=322970.msg2551596#msg2551596 date=1227585900]

I have to say Microsoft’s 3d games are worst of the lot. They are built with BMPs. Which means, you need a damn good card to handle all the size.
[/quote]wat

bmp images are like 2mb each… uses lots of video card…[/quote]
I have the feeling you have no clue what you’re talking about.

Read full topic
